20101223213034.000|20101223213036.000|TR0|military is going to trust but verify.

20101223213038.000|20101223213041.000|TR0|the village elders there had to sign off 
20101223213041.000|20101223213043.000|TR0|on them before they were let go.  Those 
20101223213043.000|20101223213045.000|TR0|village elders will be responsible for 
20101223213045.000|20101223213047.000|TR0|what happens to them from here on out.
20101223213047.000|20101223213050.000|TR0|
20101223213050.000|20101223213052.000|TR0|Also, the men have to report to a military 
20101223213052.000|20101223213054.000|TR0|station about once every 15 days.  As they 
20101223213054.000|20101223213057.000|TR0|prove their conduct, that will stretch to 
20101223213057.000|20101223213059.000|TR0|once a month, once every six months, once
